title: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Mushroom
description: A delicious and easy vegetarian appetizer.
steps: Gently clean mushrooms and remove stems.
Chop mushroom stems and set aside.
heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add onion and chopped mushroom stems and cook until softened.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.
Remove from heat and stir in feta cheese
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Fill mushroom caps with the spinach mixture.
or until mushrooms are tender and filling is golden brown.
